page.title: 06The Market in Rye
page.content: On Thursday 23rd of May 1985 our group went to ask questions in the market. The market is held every Thursday in Rye and it is a general market. We asked questions such as do you live in Rye, East Guildford or Playden? Or are you a visitor? We found that a third were local people, a third came from nearby villages, and a third were visitors to the town. After this we asked what extra stalls do you think are needed? Most people wanted more food stalls and five people said more clothes stalls. One person said a plant stall would be nice.
